title: help I can not enter the league of legend
body: I have this account since 2013 and returned to enter and stay loading

replies.body: It kinda sounds like you mean the client just stays on the loading screen after the game lobby ends? First make sure you check over the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure you're able to keep a stable connection with our servers. Sometimes, if you have some kind of hiccup on the loading screen, it can cause the whole game to crash momentarily.
